Good day. 

 

Please find attached the new store Insurance file for Aquazzura El Khayat & Etoile La Boutique Al Khayat.  

Kindly apply for the store insurance and confirm the Policy. 

 

Thanks 

 

Regards

Fashiuddin Jaffar
